retail.name: Anna's Taqueria
retail.description_html: Anna's Taqueria at MIT serves tacos, SUPER burritos, quesadillas, chips, salsa, fresh guacamole...and more authentic mexican cuisines! Anna's also offers catering options.

retail.name: Koch Café
retail.description_html: The new Koch Cafe, is conveniently located on the ground floor of the new Koch Institute for Integrative Cancer Research. Entree specials change daily and are complimented by, artisan flat bread pizza, made-to-order deli and panini sandwiches, soup du jour (2), prepared salads, sandwiches, sushi and a variety of sweet and savory snacks and bakery items. Breakfast pastries are all made fresh in-house and Peet's Coffee is the featured brew.

retail.name: Bosworth's Café
retail.description_html:
Designed for MIT by MIT, this café features fresh-brewed Peet’s Coffees, hot and iced specialty drinks and gourmet teas, plus fabulous pastries and desserts by renowned Boston bakeries. Bosworth’s is a coffee drinker’s favorite and is not to be missed!

Menu options:
Assorted Peet's Coffee Beverages
Hot Coffee, Iced Beverages, Lattes
Assorted Bottled Juice
Odwalla/ Tropicana / Bottled Water
Assorted Pastries, Muffins, and Bagels
Assorted Cakes, Bundt Cakes, Biscotti and Cookies
Whole Fruit
Biscotti

retail.name: 100 Main Marketplace
retail.description_html:
Located in the new Sloan School of Management building, 100 Main Marketplace is MIT's most comprehensive food service establishment.

Serving breakfast, lunch and early evening meals, menus include a full hot breakfast, made to order panini sandwiches and saute and stir fry items. 100 Main Marketplace also offers a full grill menu featuring burgers, grilled chicken and other favorites...not to mention their huge salad bar.

retail.name: Clover Food Truck
retail.description_html: An entirely vegetarian/vegan menu created from locally-sourced ingredients. The menu includes breakfast items, coffee, salads, soups, sandwiches and other dishes including special creations by Clover's Chef.

retail.name: Asian Bistro Food Truck

location.street: 70 Carleton Street & Corner of Ames Street

retail.description_html:
Asian Bistro Food Truck (Momogoose) serves Pan-Asian & Pacific Rim, Vietnamese dishes, all served over white rice with a side of vegetables (unless otherwise indicated).

Menu Options:

White rice may be substituted for egg noodles at no additional charge.
Brown rice or basil fried rice substitution is an additional $.50 charge

(*) denotes slightly spicy items.

Meat Entrees

Hawaiian Chicken *
Chicken breast meat in slightly spicy sweet &sour sauce with pineapples & bell peppers

Sweet & Sour Pork
Chinese style boneless pork loin covered in a sweet & sour glaze

Coconut Curry Chicken

Spicy Jamaican Chicken

Beef w/ Broccoli
Sliced beef sauteed with broccoli

Beef Curry
Tender beef stewed Vietnamese style with potatoes & carrots in a red curry sauce

Mango Chicken Curry

Fresh steamed salmon steamed with a light black bean sauce

Korean Style Chicken w/ Black Beans

Vegetarian Lo-Mein

Spinach Salad

Soft tofu in miso broth

Fruit Cocktail
5 different fruits such as cantaloupe, watermelon, honeydew, orange, strawberry, apple, mango

retail.name: Jerusalem Café Food Truck
retail.description_html:
From Baklava to Babaganush, Jerusalem Cafe features all your favorite Middle-Eastern dishes. Choose from a variety of lunch specials including lamb shawarmas, BBQ chicken, goat curry and pistachio salad.

Menu options:

Soups

  • Lentil soup
Sandwiches
(Rolled up in large Syrian bread)
  • Beef, lamb, or chicken kebab
  • Chicken shawarma
  • Lamb shawarma
  • Falafel sandwich
  • Hommus sandwich
  • Falafel and hommus
  • Tabuli sandwich
  • Grape leaves sandwich
  • Babaganush sandwich
  • Weggie sandwich
  • Greeksalad sandwich
Lunch Specials
(Served with rice and vegetables)
  • Lamb, beef, chicken kebab
  • B.B.Q. chicken or beef
  • Lamb, chicken, or goat curry
  • Vegetable curry
  • Chicken mustard
  • Chicken dijonnaise
  • Mujadaro
Salads
(served with Syrian bread and fine herb dressing)
  • Cairo, pistachio, or cashew
  • Chicken salad
  • Charcoal chicken salad
  • Garden vegetable salad
  • Greek salad
  • Spinach salad
Beverages
  • Spring water
  • Juice
  • Iced tea
  • Soda
Desserts
  • Baklava

retail.name: Jose's Mexican Food Truck
retail.description_html: From tacos to enchiladas to the "Super Burrito" wrap, José's serves all your Southwest and Tex-Mex favorites. Looking for something a little lighter? Try Jose's homemade black bean soup or fajita salad.

retail.name: MIT Market, Produce Stand
retail.description_html:
The MIT Produce Market offers affordable, high-quality fruits and vegetables to the MIT community.  Located in the Gates Lobby in the Stata Center (Building 32), the MIT Produce Market is open every Tuesday from 11:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.

The MIT Produce Market is operated by Russo's, a family-run company in that has been serving the Boston area for over 75 years.

retail.name: Muddy Charles Pub
retail.description_html:
The Muddy Charles Pub has been on the MIT campus since 1968. It has welcomed Nobel Laureates, played host to entrepreneurs and their start-ups, and enjoyed global exposure. Most of the patrons are MIT graduate students and prices are kept affordable for them.

Food can be ordered in from local restaurants (menus available at the bar). There is not a kitchen on site. The Pub is only open to MIT affiliates. This includes friends, family, etc. of students, faculty, staff, and alumni. Be sure to bring a MIT ID and a government-issued ID (21+ only).

retail.name: Cambridge Grill (Alpine Bagel)
retail.description_html:
Dunkin' Donuts and the Cambridge Grill are both operated by Alpine Bagel. Enjoy all of your favorites at Dunkin' and BYOB - that's 'Build Your Own Burger' - at The Cambridge Grill. Enjoy hot-off-the-grill specialties, stone-oven pizzas, salads and more.

View their Menu:
Cambridge Pizzeria

Pizza by the Slice
Cheese only
w/ Toppings

Speciality Pizza and Calzone
10” Cheese only

retail.name: Dunkin' Donuts
retail.description_html:
Dunkin' Donuts and the Cambridge Grill share space on the first floor of the Stratton Student center. Enjoy all your Dunkin' favorites including, of course, Boston's favorite coffee!

Menu options:

  • Donuts/Munchkins
  • Breakfast Sandwiches
  • Muffins
  • Cookies
  • Beverages; Coffee (hot/iced), Lattes, Tea, Juices, Hot Chocolate

retail.name: LaVerde's Market
retail.description_html:
La Verde's combines the level of choice you expect from a supermarket with the easy access of a convenience store. Shop for items ranging from basic ingredients to fully prepared meals, as well as household staples and beauty items. With La Verde's, you can stay well stocked without leaving campus.

From the fresh salad bar to their new upscale cappuccino latte machine, you can tell this campus grocery is far from ordinary. And they're there for you 24/7, whether you’re hungry for great take-out, out of toothpaste, or down to your last few international phone minutes.

Store offerings:

Muffins, bagels, croissants and other baked goods

  • Wide assortment of iced and hot coffee and tea, frozen drinks, cappuccino, and hot chocolate
  • Salad bar
  • 4 fresh, delicious soup choices every day
  • Made-to-order sandwiches, Panini’s, Calzones, Pizza
  • Hot, made-to-order breakfast sandwiches
  • Large selection of groceries, including cereal, cookies and crackers, pasta, frozen entrees, pizza, and ice cream
  • Fresh fruits and veggies
  • Freshly made packaged sandwiches
  • Macro vegan meals
  • Fresh sushi
  • Huge assortment of bottled beverages
  • Candy by the pound
  • Health and beauty items
  • Cleaning and paper supplies
  • School and office supplies
  • Greeting cards
  • Phone cards
  • Magazines

retail.name: MacGregor Convenience Store
retail.description_html:
Whether you live in a residence hall or apartment, this convenient west campus location has all the essentials of daily life, from fresh sushi to laundry detergent to brownie mix. And we’re open until the wee hours for late-night munchies or last-minute birthday cards.

 

Store offerings:
  • Cereal, cookies and crackers, pasta, cake and brownie mix, frozen entrees, pizza, and ice cream
  • Huge assortment of bottled beverages
  • Fresh fruits and veggies
  • Freshly made sandwiches
  • Macro vegan meals
  • Fresh sushi
  • Yogurt and hummus
  • Health and beauty items
  • Cleaning and paper supplies
  • School and office supplies
  • Phone cards
  • Magazines

retail.name: Shawarma Shack
retail.description_html: Shawarma Shack is coming soon...

retail.name: Shinkansen
retail.description_html:
Shinkansen is located in the Lobdell Food Court (W20, Second Floor) and offers favorites from Japanese Cuisine.

Menu options:

  • Sushi
  • Hibachi Chicken, Beef, Vegetable Dishes*
  • Teriyaki Chicken, Beef, Vegetable Dishes*
  • Bubble Tea

 

*Dishes are also available with brown rice

retail.name: Subway
retail.description_html:
With a mixture of fresh ingredients, a whole lot of customer service, and a dash of innovation, the SUBWAY® brand continues to be the leader of providing nutritious and delicious sandwiches the whole family will love.

Whatever you're in the mood for, SUBWAY® has a wide variety of Subs, salads, and sides to choose from. Every one of our Subs is made fresh in front of you, exactly the way you want it

Simply choose the sandwich your taste buds have a hankerin’ for, then build it just the way you like with your favorite freshly baked bread, crisp veggies and sauces. We’ll even toast it to hot and tasty perfection if that suits your fancy.

retail.name: R&D Pub
retail.description_html:
The R&D, like all of Stata Center, is a creative space offering a relaxed atmosphere for the MIT. Located on 4th floor, the Pub offers ample seating for impromptu gatherings with friends and colleagues, including a mezzanine with soft seating. Order everything from crudité and fruit and cheese, to sushi and personal pan pizzas. Beverages include beer and wine, along with soft drinks, tea, and coffee. 21+ only please.

Please contact Ashley Griset, 617-253-2735, if you would like to reserve the R&D Pub for your special event!

Menu options:

Appetizers

  • R& D Nachos- Crisp Nachos smothered with melted cheddar cheese, jalapenos, diced tomatoes, topped off with salsa, sour cream and guzcomole.
  • Chicken Quesadilla – Grilled Tortilla, stuffed with marinated chicken, salsa, cheddar cheese, tomatoes and scallions. Sour cream served on the side.
  • Roasted Potato Wedges – Basket of Roasted Potato Wedges served with zesty Garlic Aioli.
  • Pita chips with dip – Pita triangles seasoned and baked served with garlic hummus for dipping.
  • Thai Chicken – Skewered strips of marinated Chicken served with peanut dipping sauce.
  • Spiced Pecans – Bowl of hot & sweet toasted Pecan halves.
  • Sliders - BBQ Beef Brisket, Pulled Pork or Buffalo Chicken on a toasted roll.
  • Personal Pizzas - Cheese or create your own by adding toppings, choose from pepperoni, sausage, onion, mushrooms, and peppers.

Wine and Beer List

White Wine

  • Hogue cellars Riesling
  • Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanca
  • Hogue Cellars Chardonnay
  • Hess Chardonnay
  • Di Lenardo Pinot Grigio

Red Wine

  • Palacio Glorioso Rioja
  • Morande Pinot Noir
  • De Loache Russian River
  • Cabrnet Sauvignon
  • Reynolds Shiraz
  • Luis Fellipe Merlot

Specialty Brewed Beers

  • Cambridge Tall Tale Pale Ale
  • Smuttynose India Pale Ale
  • Allagash White
  • Stella Artois
  • Brooklyn Brown
  • Guinness
  • Bottled Beer
  • Budweiser
  • Bud Light
  • Pabst Blue Ribbon
  • Corona
  • Heineken
  • Amstel Light
  • Sam Adams
  • O’Doul’s non alcoholic
  • Smirnoff Twist

 

For information on event reservations and Hors d'Oeuvres menus please e-mail techcatering@mit.edu or visit the Tech Catering Web site.

retail.name: The Thirsty Ear Pub
retail.description_html: Looking for something different on campus? The Thirsty Ear Pub offers a selection of food matched only in quality by the most popular bars across Cambridge. So come on by, sample what our kitchen’s cookin’ up, and let us know what you think! The pub is open to those age 21+, only.

retail.name: MIT Faculty Dining
retail.description_html: MIT Faculty Dining offers lunch service for MIT Faculty Members and their invited guests only. To make reservations at MIT Faculty Dining, contact Denise Cuilla at 617-253-7373  or Kerri Donnelly at 617-253-6494.

retail.name: Café Spice

location.description: Lobdell Food Court in the Stratton Student Center (W20)

retail.description_html: Café Spice Express serves Indian Cuisine favorites. The newly renovated operation serves an expanded menu of appetizers and Kathi rolls, as well as favorites like Chicken Tikka Masala and Chicken Vindaloo.

retail.name: Café Four
retail.description_html:
In the heart of the “infinite corridor,” Building 4 Café is MIT's busiest location per square foot!
 
It is perfect for a quick cup of freshly brewed Green Mountain Coffee Roasters coffee and a bagel in the morning, or soup and a sandwich for your afternoon or early evening meal on the run.
 
The café also offers Good-to-Go salads, sandwiches and specialty items, including a wide variety of sushi prepared daily.

retail.name: Steam Café
retail.description_html:
Steam Cafe is a collaborative project developed jointly by The School of Architecture and Planning (students and administration), MIT Dining and Sodexo Campus Dining Services.
 
Delicious, simple and substantial food from around the world will be served here every day with an emphasis on diversity, nutrition and community interaction.

retail.name: Forbes Family Café
retail.description_html: MIT's Ray and Maria Stata Center for Computer Information and Intelligence Sciences features a 220-seat dining facility that serves continental breakfast and an extensive lunch menu. Forbes Café proudly serves Starbucks Coffee, as well as pizza, baked pasta and toasted sandwiches, hot entrees, made-to-order specials as well as grab-n-go sandwiches and salads. The facility will be open extended hours for café items such as coffee, snacks and to-go meals.

retail.name: Pacific Street Café
retail.description_html: Pacific Street Cafe requires the highest standards of food handling from its employees and vendors. The management strives to assure quality food and on time delivery. In addition we offer assistance to our clients to have a worry-free event by planning each step with them. Our mission is "great food at competitive price".

retail.name: Zigo Café
retail.description_html:
Zigo started with love of people, of fun, and especially good food. Like most of us who work long hours, our lives were full but our refrigerators were not. We filled our evening hunger with pizza, cereal, frozen dinners, and many restaurants. “Where was the love in this?” our taste buds, waistlines, and wallets cried? 
 
With zigo we put delicious, healthful meals back into the hands of busy people. With one stop on your way home, you have a meal that is simple to prepare and yummy to eat. 
 
With the ever-changing zigo menu, we bring the most delectable foods from around the world to your table. Each of our recipes has been taste-tested again and again. Our meals use only the finest and freshest ingredients. That means crispy not mushy, seasoned not salted, flaky not chewy.
